title: Lets start a ranked team!
body:
Hey summoners! I really want to create a ranked team to vs. against other teams. We need active members and the team hasn't been created yet. I need players who are good at the game, wont feed, using Oceania server and must be lvl 30(duh). Games could be either weekly,monthly or daily as long as we get some practise time together.
If you are interested please add me: GalaKnight
and if anyone can think of a good name for the team please add a message here in this discussion. It is very useful if you have Skype but if not its all good.
Have a Great Day Summoners:)

replies.body: I'm Looking for a ranked team. Main Jg but competent in top mid and sup as well. s5. Play atleast a couple games most nights
Wow hey it's me big v
Not sure if there is room but currently silver 3 top main and can play everyday :)

I can support, mid and top but main support.
I'm available every night at around midnight and Sunday and monday all day.
Thats cool as well so i'll add you today along with the other players.
Im allowed on league during  7-9(2hr) each weekday and on weekends its random
I can go any role but the ones i cannot go are top and sup but i guess i can sup.
All the lanes are taken but we havent sorted out whose going where, for now its just telling us what lanes we can play.

I'm in the same boat and would like a team, to progress quicker. i have a brother aswell you mains top and is a mean carry. i main primarily jg, mid , supp.   cool team name? FateNix aha. im on every night so ill be a regular

im out for the day but add us and ill gladly join.
Alright cool i'll add you when i get the chance today =)
Preferred computer program or mode of communication?
